item.title: Jenn add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "There are two ways to reach me: by way of kisses or by way of the imagination. But there is a hierarchy: the kisses alone don't work." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "He could hear Donald saying something else but it didn't matter anymore what, because then and there it occurred to him that maybe the emptiness he'd been living with all this time hadn't really been emptiness at all, but loneliness gone unrecognized. How can a mind know how alone it is until it brushes up against some other mind? A single mark had been made, another person's memory imposed onto his mind, and now the magnitude of his own loss was impossible for Samson to ignore. It was breathtaking. He sank to his knees...It was as if a match had been struck, throwing light on just how dark it was." -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Mark Helprin
item.description: "In the same way that certain sections of the city were mortal battlegrounds, some parts of the calendar were always more warlike than others, and during the days between Christmas and the new year all elements seemed to conspire to subdue the soul. Fire, rain, sickness, cold, and death were everywhere spread through the dark as in a painting of hell. People struggled until exhaustion, giving everything they had, and the days were packed with trials and mysteries." -- Mark Helprin

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Great loves have legs and wings. They are substantial. They do not dissapate so easily... Great loves have staying power. Or so I told myself." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jennifer Haigh
item.description: "When they touched it was like touching her own body. From childhood they had been the same height; their arms and legs and hands were still perfectly congruent. Only the centers of them were different, aching, fascinated, every part of them heated to the same temperature as the sun warmed pond." -- Jennifer Haigh

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Steve Berry
item.description: "He that endureth to the end, shall be saved." -- Steve Berry

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Zoe Heller
item.description: "When you live alone, your furnishings, your possessions, are always confronting you with the thinness of your existence." -- Zoe Heller

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Glen Duncan
item.description: "How to describe hell? Disembowelled landscape busy with suffering, incessant heat, permanent scarlet twilight, a swirling snowfall of ash, the stink of pain and the din of...if only, hell is two things: the absence of God and the presence of time. Infinite variations on that theme. Doesn't sound so bad, does it? Well, trust me." -- Glen Duncan

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Dean R. Koontz
item.description: "No one's life should be rooted in fear. We are born for wonder, for joy, for hope, for love, to marvel at the mystery of existence, to be ravished by the beauty of the world, to seek truth and meaning, to acquire wisdom, and by our treatment of others to brighten the corner where we are." -- Dean R. Koontz

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Long ago, men went to sea, and women waited for them, standing on the edge of the water, scanning the horizon for the tiny ship. Now I wait for Henry. He vanishes unwillingly, without warning. I wait for him. Each moment that I wait feels like a year, an eternity. Each moment is as slow and transparent as glass. Through each moment I can see infinite moments lined up, waiting. Why has he gone where I cannot follow?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Andrew Sean Greer
item.description: "It is a brave and stupid thing, a beautiful thing, to waste one's life for love." -- Andrew Sean Greer

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Susanna Tamaro
item.description: "Happiness always has an object... Depends on external things. Joy... Has no object. It seizes you for no apparent reason, it's like the sun, its burning is fueled by its own heart." -- Susanna Tamaro

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "When we're awake, we see what we need to see. When we're asleep, we see what is really there." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Kids think with their brains cracked wide open; becoming an adult, I've decided, is only a slow sewing shut." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Philip Beard
item.description: "That on any day you could pick there are thousands and thousands of little deaths, tiny tragedies, and that all of them matter." -- Philip Beard

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I couldn't help but think, This car is taking me to a mental hospital and my mother is treating it like open-mic night at a Greenwich Village café." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Jenn add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Take no heed of her.... She reads a lot of books." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are a uniquely portable magic." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "A tragedy is a tragedy, and at the bottom, all tragedies are stupid. Give me a choice and I'll take <i>A Midsummer Night's Dream</i> over <i>Hamlet</i> every time. Any fool with steady hands and a working set of lungs can build up a house of cards and then blow it down, but it takes a genius to make people laugh." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "Time’s a goon, right? You gonna let that goon push you around?” Scotty shook his head. “The goon won." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I'm always happy," Sasha said. "Sometimes I just forget." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "If I had a view like this to look down on every day, I would have the energy and inspiration to conquer the world. The trouble is, when you most need such a view, no one gives it to you." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jenn add a quote by Harlan Coben
item.description: "..."better to have loved and lost" bullshit. Don't show me paradise and then burn it down." -- Harlan Coben
